Segments.Text: A new version of BlendFarm is available. This version supports Blender 3.0 after API changes. It also adds requested feature of saving render settings.
A new version of BlendFarm is available. This version includes queueing and multi-project tabs. It will now have an announcement system to inform you of new versions. And of course some bug fixes.
If you find any bugs please create an issue in the Github Repository. And if you are enjoying BlendFarm, please consider a donation on Patreon
